thread.title: BRIEF-Pure Gold Announces Increase In Financing To C$20.9 Mln

title: BRIEF-Pure Gold Announces Increase In Financing To C$20.9 Mln
text:
April 27, 2018 / 7:02 PM / Updated 27 minutes ago BRIEF-Pure Gold Announces Increase In Financing To C$20.9 Mln Reuters Staff
April 27 (Reuters) - Pure Gold Mining Inc:
* PURE GOLD ANNOUNCES INCREASE IN FINANCING TO C$20.9 MILLION
* PURE GOLD MINING - ANGLOGOLD ASHANTI HAS AGREED TO PURCHASE 12.8 MILLION UNITS OF CO AT C$0.62 PER UNIT FOR GROSS PROCEEDS OF C$7.9 MILLION
* ENTERED AMENDED AGREEMENT WITH SPROTT CAPITAL PARTNERS WHICH UNDERWRITERS HAVE AGREED TO PURCHASE 16.1 MILLION UNITS AT C$0.62 PER UNIT
* EACH UNIT WILL CONSIST OF 1 COMMON SHARE OF CO AND ONE-HALF OF 1 COMMON SHARE PURCHASE WARRANT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
